name: MonsterCorp
description:
You are MonsterCorp's CEO. You realize how horrible you are, and the only way to fix it is to destroy your company by making horrible choices to drive your stock into unheard of negative value.

Destroy the company in 3 days!

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

P Key to open and close the daily newspaper

Explore the office and shake hands with (bump into) people to chose their decision option.

Press Space To Begin

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=50010
